articles.title: Nasdaq edges down from records ahead of big tech earnings
articles.content: The Nasdaq retreated from a record ahead of earnings from Google parent Alphabet and other tech giants, while European markets fretted over an August 1 deadline for the EU to avert steep tariffs from US President Donald Trump."European markets have been getting increasingly jittery as the (August 1) deadline approaches," said David Morrison, senior market analyst at Trade Nation.

articles.title: Morgan Stanley recalibrates its view on Apple stock ahead of earnings
articles.content: Signals are shifting quietly as Apple heads into a high-stakes week.

articles.title: Apple alerted Iranians to iPhone spyware attacks, say researchers
articles.content: Researchers say Apple sent out threat notifications to several Iranians in recent months, saying their iPhones had been hacked. Iran is likely behind the attacks.

articles.title: Commentary: CEOs have a new boss — Trump
articles.content: Trump tells businesses what products to make, where to make them, and who to hire. Is this capitalism?

articles.title: How AI Earnings Could Make or Break the S&P 500’s Rally
articles.content: The stock market’s most powerful bullish theme faces a series of litmus tests over the next two weeks that could define broader performance over the second half of the year, starting with Google parent  Alphabet  second-quarter earnings update on Wednesday.  The  stocks, which include major tech firms Alphabet,  Microsoft Tesla Meta Platforms Amazon.com Apple  and  Nvidia  comprise around a third of the  total market value.  Nearly a third of the estimated $536.3 billion in collective profit from S&P 500 companies in the second quarter will come from just two sectors: information technology and communications services.

articles.title: iOS 26 beta 4 arrives, with Liquid Glass tweaks and AI news summaries
articles.content: Apple launches iOS 26 beta 4 for developers with updates to Liquid Glass and AI notification summaries. A public beta is expected later this week.

articles.title: Tailor Brands Builds Operating System to Power Small Business Growth
